job_description:
Sales Consultant / Referral Partner

Appraisal / Cost Segregation Firm, Walter O’Connell Tax Services, is a Full-Service Commercial Appraisal Company; offering a complete line of Valuation & Cost Segregation Services. A National Company we are looking for ‘Referral Partners’ in all 50-States. We offer Commercial Real Property, Commercial Personal Property, Business Valuation Services and Cost Segregation Services.

25% Referral Fee paid for All Referrals (No Cap $)

Perfect for:

CPA’s & Accountants looking to refer clients.

Commercial Real Estate Brokers & Agents looking to refer clients.

Retired CPA’s, Accountants, Real Estate Professionals.

Work From Home!!!!!

This is not a ‘Sales Position’! This is a ‘Referral Position’! Give us a Strong Lead, and we will make the Sale! 25% Commission Paid on the Gross Sales Amount ($) with no Cap. We have no referral expectations! Refer one job a year, one job a month, one job a week, or one job a day, we will pay you the 25% Commission!

Qualifications: CPA’s & Accountants looking to refer clients
Benefits: 25% Referral Fee paid for All Referrals (No Cap $)
25% Commission Paid on the Gross Sales Amount ($) with no Cap
